content.prompt:
Fred Jones Jr. Museum

The pot shown and its decoration both suggest that its creators had a desire to

choices.label: imitate the syncopated rhythms of jazz music
create works depicting the local landscape and vegetation
incorporate a wide variety of values, hues, and textures
harmonize the ornamentation with the form of the vessel

topic.text: 5.2: Materials, Processes, and Techniques in Indigenous American Art

skill.text: Skill 5.B: In analyzing a work of art beyond the image set, explain how artistic decisions about form, style, materials, technique, and/or content shape a work of art (or group of related works of art).
